title: Buffalo Police investigate fatal shooting on French Street
content:
BUFFALO, N.Y. (WIVB) — Buffalo Police are investigating a shooting that happened on French Street Wednesday night.
Officers responded to the shooting just after 6 p.m. Police say a 16-year-old male was shot in a vacant lot and declared dead at the scene.
No arrests have been made. Anyone with information is asked to contact Buffalo Police at 716-847-2255.
